humanMachineDialogue.author: Memory Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: According to the pathology report, one out of the three sentinel lymph nodes has a micrometastasis (>0.2 mm to 2 mm and/or >200 cells) with the largest tumoral deposit being 1mm. Therefore, the N stage for this patient is N1.

humanMachineDialogue.author: ZS Reasoning
humanMachineDialogue.text: The patient has metastatic carcinoma in one out of three sentinel lymph nodes, with the largest tumoral deposit being 1mm. This corresponds to a pathologic N1mi (N1, micro-metastasis) stage.
